short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you check snopes with a highlight and right-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See a story and not sure if it's real or not? Highlight the text and search famed debunker Snopes with this tool.
